trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Perth
There were no other sightings in Perth on or around April 1st 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsAt approximately 7.40pm, sitting outside Burswood Dome (3kms East from Perth CBD), facing East, watching planes taking off in the distance. A star-like object appeared in the eastern sky at around 60degrees from the horizon. It was quite bright, and moved slowly in an easterly direction.The light moved slowly in the sky, and appeared to move up and down in a "bouncing" pattern. It remained visible for around 4 minutes. The light faded out within aprox 5 seconds. There were no flashing lights or other features resembling an aircraft. The object was quite high up, and not following the normal aircraft line of flight out of Perth Airports.There were 5 witnesses to the event from Lady Gaga's touring crew with whom I was working with that evening.
